title: Probably unpopular idea: give Garen's villain mechanic to Rengar
body:
Rengar is supposed to hunt the strongest prey, and right now, he just needs to kill everyone once.
If we do end up making major changes to Rengar, can we consider this?

Of course, it doesn't have to be just some extra damage, but some way to help him duel/kill their strongest champion.

replies.body: You don't have to tag your opinion as unpopular, if it is then everyone already knows it.
